successes.title: Medical Inc. The Movie
successes.description: Capture the record, most backed film on KS. $350K! Put Heath and Care back in healthcare! Releasing in theaters in Fall of 2012.

Pledges.description: You get a "Special Thanks" on our website and first look at updates on our progress. And we sure appreciate your support!
For a $25 pledge, you'll get a DVD of the film personally signed by both the director and producer and a collector's edition of our movie poster. And your place in history...

Okay, now we're talking! For just $100 you get 5 autographed collectors' DVD's, 2 ( also signed) collectors' movie posters and a crew-member commemorative T-shirt. You'll also be listed on our website as a "make it happen" supporter, thank you!

A great value for you and a huge help for us. You get 10 autographed copies of the DVD, 2 signed collector's edition movie posters and 2 of our crew-member T-shirts. Use the DVD's to spread the word, take the lead in spreading health! And yes, you are listed on our website as a key supporter.

Perfect for an office or small practice.  You get 25 autographed DVD's, 5 signed collector edition movie posters and 5 of our crew T-shirts. Make your office a launch point for what will be one of the most talked about films of 2012.

Tailor made for promoting a growing wellness business or professional practice. You get100 DVD's (25 signed), 10 autographed collector's edition movie posters, 10 crew member T-shirts, 10 crew member hats. PLUS a "Special Thanks" Screen Credit and 10 theater tickets to the premiere in either NY or LA.

Afterparty! You get 250 DVD's (25 signed), 10 autographed collector's edition movie posters, 10 crew member t-shirts, 10 crew member hats. Plus a "Special Thanks" screen credit and 10 theater tickets to the premiere in your choice of NY or LA. ALSO, a table for 10 at the afterparty after the premiere. (either NY or LA)

Associate Producer credit. You get 500 DVD's (25 autographed), 5 autographed collector's edition movie posters, 5 crew member t-shirts, 5 crew member hats. Plus screen credit as an Associate Producer. You also receive 5 tickets to the premiere in either NY or LA, including dinner for you and a guest at the Producer's dinner before the premiere. You'll also be invited to any industry award events (assuming invitations are extended!) Come join us!

Executive Producer credit! You get 1,000 DVD's (25 autographed), 10 autographed collector's edition movie posters, 10 crew member T-shirts, 10 crew member hats. Plus screen credit as an Executive Producer! You also receive 10 tickets to the premiere in either NY or LA, including dinner for you and a guest with the Executive Producer and Director before the premiere. Also, you're included with an invitation for 2 to any industry award events (assuming invitations are extended!) Limited to 3. This will be an award-winning film, come join us!

Can you fill a theater with your clients and their friends and families? If so, the then having a private screening in your city could catapult your business! Bobby Sheehan and Jeff Hays will fly to your city and do a pre-release screening for your audience in a theater or  other facility that you provide. Question and answer session and commentary. US only. Includes signed DVD's for your guests (up to 500), 10 hats, 10 t-shirts, and 10 signed posters.

Co-Executive Producer credit. You get 1,000 DVD's (25 autographed), 10 autographed collector's edition movie posters, 10 crew member T-shirts, 10 crew member hats. Plus screen credit as a Co-Executive Producer! You also receive 10 tickets to the premiere in either NY or LA, including dinner for you and a guest at the producer's dinner with the Executive Producers, Producer and Director before the premiere. Also, you're included with an invitation for 2 to any industry award events (assuming invitations are extended!) Limited to 2. This will be an award-winning film, come join us!
